studyDescription.description:
Real CHAVI 001 description: The specimens collected during the course of this study will be used to investigate the following specific aims:

Aims directed at the transmitted virus
  1. To determine the genetic, biologic, antigenic, and structural characteristics of sexually transmitted virus and mechanisms underlying virus transmission.
  2. To determine the source (cell free and/or cell associated) of sexually acquired HIV-1.
  3. To determine the cellular and molecular events in mucosal epithelial cell induction of virion production from virus infected cells.
  4. To determine whether acutely transmitted virus differs from chronic HIV-1 in co-receptor usage, relative CD4+ dependence and neutralization susceptibility
